meanings.sent1: I picked some juicy damsons from the tree.
meanings.sent2: The jam was made from sweet damsons.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel stole the damsons from the basket.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was as vibrant as a basket of fresh damsons.
meanings.sent5: The scent of ripe damsons filled the kitchen with sweetness.

meanings.definition: The fruit of a damson tree.
meanings.sent1: She enjoyed the tartness of the damsons in the pie.
meanings.sent2: The branches were heavy with ripe damsons.
meanings.sent3: The children had a playful damsons tossing contest.
meanings.sent4: The damsons glistened like jewels in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The taste of the damsons lingered on her tongue.

meanings.sent1: The old orchard had a majestic damsons tree.
meanings.sent2: The damsons tree provided shade in the garden.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat climbed the damsons tree and got stuck.
meanings.sent4: The damsons tree stood tall, its branches reaching for the sky.
meanings.sent5: The fragrance of the damsons tree blossoms filled the air.
